Title: Like Bad at Things
Writer: Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Alex Gansa (developed for American television by), Howard Gordon (developed for American television by), Patrick Harbinson, Chip Johannessen, Anya Leta (staff writer)
Actors: Claire Danes, Elizabeth Marvel, Maury Sterling, Linus Roache
Plot: Carrie follows a lead. Saul's situation goes from bad to worse.
